Package com.ace.lewissketch

Classes used to draw Lewis structures and convert them into MOL and MRV strings.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
LsConstants Package-wide constants.
 

Class Summary
Atom Describes an atom in a Lewis structure.
Bond Describes a bond of a Lewis structure.
Electrons Unshared electrons of an atom: their x,y coordinates and the number of them.
Graph Combines on-screen and off-screen graphics objects and mimics needed Java standard Graphics class methods, applying all invocations to both (on and off) actual graphics objects.
GUI Sets up the Graphical User Interface (buttons, listener, toolbars, etc) for the LewisSketch applet.
LewisSketch The main code for the LewisSketch applet.
LsActionListener Action listener for the LewisSketch applet, mostly "button responses".
LsCanvas The drawing canvas class for the LewisSketch application.
LsMouseListener Responses to mouse events on the LewisSketch applet.
LsUtils A collection of utility functions and constants for the LewisSketch applet.
MinMax A local class for storing min and max x,y coordinates.
Molecule A data structure which represents the chemical figure drawn on the canvas of the LewisSketch applet.
MolEditor A dialog box which displays the current molecule string, allowing it to be modified by the user, and allowing the user to import the modified data.
MsgBox For debugging and brief messages.
Octants The area around an atom is divided into directional octants (N, S, E, W, etc.) into which bonds, lone electrons and a charge may be placed.
PeriodicChart A dialog box which displays a periodic chart of the elements and allows the user to select one.
ReadMOL Converts a string in MOL format into a Molecule.
ReadMRV Converts a string in MRV format into a Molecule.
ReadString Converts a string representing a molecule into a Molecule.
Scalable Scales a Molecule object so that coordinates are in range.
UserTask List of tasks that LewisSketch performs.
WriteMRV Converts a molecule or a string representing a molecule (MOL or MRV) to MRV format for use by JChem or for display in MarvinView.
 

Package com.ace.lewissketch Description

Classes used to draw Lewis structures and convert them into MOL and MRV strings.
